method: Cook the bow tie pasta according to package instructions.
Rinse the cooked pasta with cold water to cool it down.
In a large bowl, combine the cooled pasta, diced cucumber, diced tomato, sliced black olives, crumbled feta cheese, torn basil leaves, and chopped sun-dried tomatoes.
In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Pour the dressing over the salad ingredients and toss to coat evenly.
Refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving to allow the flavors to meld together.
Serve chilled as a refreshing and surprising salad.
